attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i thouroughly believe that youth clubs should be well funded and it appears that they are not i am only fourteen and myself a regular at the youth club in amersham,bucks and me and most of my friends agree with me that it is the only thing to do on a friday night apart from of course waiting on a grubby corner waiting for someone stupid enough to buy underage drinkers alchohol of course aneyway i think it is in everyones intrest to make youth clubs a much better and nicer place with funds for more things to do there!
